The claim that the US is charging over: 3,000 per test for patients who may have COVID-19 is false.
The two authorized testing agencies: the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) and the New York State Department of Public Health, are not currently billing patients for COVID-19 tests.
The claim seems to be based on a news st: 3,270 for an emergency room visit and testing for other respiratory pathogens, but not for COVID-19 testing.
